# Setup


## Clear the environment

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```


## Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read from cache
```{r}
roi_data_joined <- readRDS("cache/roi_data_joined.RDS")
cd_pc_summarized <- readRDS("cache/cd_pc_data_summarized.RDS")
```

## Trim the data

```{r}
roi_data_joined_trm <- roi_data_joined %>% 
  filter(!is.na(nanoSIMS_file_id))
```

## Join the data!

```{r}
co_registered <- roi_data_joined_trm %>% 
  left_join(cd_pc_summarized,
            by = "cell_id") %>% 
  select(-c(Group, `organism.y`))

saveRDS(co_registered, "cache/co_registered.RDS")
```
